ISSUE.TITLE: Partial "_CreateOrUpdate.Seo.cshtml" Cannot be found
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.20 Error: Partial "_CreateOrUpdate.Seo.cshtml" Cannot be found # Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Install nopCommerce on a Linux machine 2. Go to Admin Portal 3. Select Catalog>Categories 4. Select Add New # Investigation and Results: Searching for occurences of this name in the Presentation folder, I found three files which are cased differently to the others. The file it was looking for is referenced with ".Seo", but is named ".SEO". This is a bug on Linux as the file system is case sensitive, and won't occur on Windows because NTFS is not.
